survey_name: Urban Bike Sharing Program Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of the city's bike-sharing program to assess satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the city's bike-sharing program?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use the city's bike-sharing program?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use the bike-sharing program? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format and include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use the bike-sharing program? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your usual pickup locations?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your usual pickup locations?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike-sharing program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike-sharing program?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the bike-sharing program to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe format for quick response.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the bike-sharing program to others?
